title: [Large-scale] Project Applying Alternative Teaching Methods in Physical Education through Collaborative Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational physical education theory and understanding of traditional pedagogical methods
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning reflecting real physical education environments through school-linked classes

learning_goals: Explain at least three core principles of alternative teaching methods in physical education using a collaborative professional development model.
Develop and execute school-applicable physical education project plans through small-group collaboration and conduct implementation evaluations.
Record ideas for improving physical education classes using smartphone-based tools and incorporate peer feedback at over 80% implementation rates.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
